name: Dreamlike Love with Seira
storyline:
The protagonist, Haruto Watari, finishes a stressful day of work.

He goes back home, exhausted, to a cluttered room that only makes him all the more fatigued.

But unable to find the drive or will to clean up, he collapses into bed and falls asleep.

Then, he has an unbelievable dream... A dream where he's the owner of a luxurious Western mansion.

And in that dream mansion, he meets a maid named Seira.

A maid whose duty is to serve him, her master—

Be it brewing a delicious cup of black tea or comforting him with kind swords, she heals his tired soul.

A dream of sweet, passionate service is about to begin...
summary: Enjoy the memories with a beautiful maid in your dreams and heal your fatigue in reality.
